articles.title: How to Watch Apple TV's New MTV-Style Music Channel
articles.description: Apple just launched Apple Music TV, a new Apple TV channel that plays round-the-clock music videos, live concerts, and other exclusive music-based content. It’s a free add-on for anyone with the Apple Music or Apple TV apps, though it’s exclusive to the US fo…
